## Packages

- Data analysis: psych, lme4, likert
- Data wrangling: tidyverse (dplyr, forcats, stringr)  
- Dates: lubridate  
- Data visualization: ggplot2, plotly
- Working with Common Online Data Sources: googlesheets, qualtRics  
- RMarkdown: knitr, rmarkdown
